https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dataLoc._instruction: Add the location of all files in which this parcellation terminology version is stored.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dataLoc.label: Data location
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/dataLoc.name: dataLocation

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/digital._instruction: Add the globally unique and persistent digital identifier of this parcellation terminology version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/digital.description: Digital handle to identify objects or legal persons.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/digital.label: Digital identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/digital.name: digitalIdentifier

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasEnti._instruction: Add all parcellation entity versions which belong to this parcellation terminology version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasEnti.label: Has entity
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/hasEnti.name: hasEntity

https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog._instruction: Enter the internationalized resource identifiers (IRIs) to the related ontological terms matching this parcellation terminology version.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog.description: Term or code used to identify something or someone registered within a particular ontology.
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog.label: Ontology identifier
https://openminds.om-i.org/props/ontolog.name: ontologyIdentifier
